# Day 1
<div class = "row">
<div class = "col-md-6">

**Morning** |

> Blast off! 

1. Power on your droid
    - Install and update R
1. Introductions
    - Why open source?
    - Why R?
1. __Project__ launch
    - Start a new R project
    - Create an R script
1. Tour __RStudio__
1. Create objects & store values
    - Variables, names, and lists
1. Make data tables (_tibbles_)
1. Upgrade R   
    - Add new R packages    
1. Read __data__ into R
    - `readr` for text files
    - `readxl` for Excel files

Packages: `readr`, `ggplot2`

<div class = "col-md-6">

**Afternoon** | 

> Explore the data
   
1. Get visual with `ggplot2`
    - Plot the data, plot the data, plot the data!
1. Explore data
    - Column names, rows, observations
    - Value types, Missing values
    - Mean, max, min 
1. Work with dates & `lubridate`
1. Transform data with `dplyr`
    - Arrange, sort, and __filter__ 
1. __mutate__ to add new columns 
1. Summarize for each __group__
    - Summary by location
1. Plot time series   
1. Saving and sharing results

Packages: `dplyr`, `lubridate`
